thread.title: BRIEF-Charter, Comcast And Cox To Form New Group To Sell National Advanced Advertising Solutions

title: BRIEF-Charter, Comcast And Cox To Form New Group To Sell National Advanced Advertising Solutions

organizations.name: cox to form new group to sell national advanced advertising solutions
sell national advanced advertising solutions reuters

text:
April 4, 2018 / 1:26 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Charter, Comcast And Cox To Form New Group To Sell National Advanced Advertising Solutions Reuters Staff 
April 4 (Reuters) - Charter Communications Inc: 
* CHARTER, COMCAST AND COX TO FORM NEW GROUP TO SELL NATIONAL ADVANCED ADVERTISING SOLUTIONS 
* CO, COMCAST & COX CREATING A NEW DIVISION WITHIN NCC MEDIA 
* ANDREW WARD, WHO CURRENTLY SERVES AS VICE PRESIDENT, CM360, WILL HEAD NEW GROUP WITHIN NCC AS GENERAL MANAGER 
* COMCAST MEDIA 360 WILL FORM FOUNDATION OF NEW DIVISION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
